resources.string:
"Hi, my name is Nilson Sasaki!!! 
I love to play sports. 
I have played soccer, golf, kung-fu, baseball, shot put and javelin throw 
Unfortunately i injured my back and i can't play anymore but i discovered that i love coding too 
now i'm coding almost every day to develop my coding skills, firstly i have starting coding in C language for embedded systems and now im studying kotlin, dart and swift for mobile devices 
I'm currently working as a intern in Aegro and hope to become a really useful asset for the company learning a lot from them and solving a lot of their problems 
I'm also studying electrical engineering in University of SÃ£o Paulo (USP) but what i really want to do is coding "
